title: need a monogram font with letters that form a diamond
content:
...and that's it. Very unhip, very infra dig, I know, but a client needs a font for monograms that sets three letters in a diamond shape. I don't need a special format for an embroidery machine, just a regular ol' typeface. They're hard to find!  
My fallback is a typeface family called Ark Monogram, but that sets letters in an oval...
author: cpkc

comments.content: [Diamond Monogram](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107131456/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/diamond-monogram/?refby=typographica), but smashing that blackletter into a diamond shell doesn't look so nice.

Thanks, Stephen.  
I should have said that the client wants a clean Deco-Moderne-ish face...

The Helvetica movie premieres in Kansas City tonight. I'm excited! I'll wear my tux...
